landing.headline: Name is the first
landing.description: A studio for modern identity and historical memory. Generate a Chinese name with precision, or explore figures who shaped entire dynasties.

cardModern.label: Studio
cardModern.title: Modern Generation
cardModern.description: Linguistic synthesis tuned to your sound, style, and intent.

cardHistorical.label: Archive
cardHistorical.title: Historical Archive
cardHistorical.description: Trace the names that defined dynasties and cultural memory.

modern.label: Modern Studio
modern.title: Craft a contemporary Chinese name.
modern.description: Select the tone, style, and rhythm. We'll generate names that feel natural to speak and meaningful to keep.
modern.note: Output includes surname, pinyin, meaning, and cultural context.
modern.empty: Your journey begins here. Fill out the form to generate names.

historical.label: Historical Archive
historical.title: Forge a historical Chinese name.
historical.description: Choose a dynasty, style, and rhythm to shape an AI-crafted historical name.
historical.note: Each result includes a short backstory and tonal tags.
historical.empty: Set your dynasty and preferences to generate a historical name.

modern.title: Name Preferences
modern.wantedSurnameDescriptionAny: Use 1-2 Chinese characters. Pair with surname type for strict validation.
modern.wantedSurnameDescriptionSingle: Must be exactly 1 Chinese character in single-surname mode.
modern.wantedSurnameDescriptionDouble: Must be exactly 2 Chinese characters in double-surname mode.

historical.title: Historical Name Preferences
historical.realNameDescription: Used to inspire a historical-sounding name.
historical.dynastyFiveDyn: Five Dynasties & Ten Kingdoms (五代十国)
historical.wantedSurnameDescriptionAny: Use 1-2 Chinese characters. Pair with surname type for strict validation.
historical.wantedSurnameDescriptionSingle: Must be exactly 1 Chinese character in single-surname mode.
historical.wantedSurnameDescriptionDouble: Must be exactly 2 Chinese characters in double-surname mode.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We encountered an unexpected error while generating your name.

notFound.title: Lost in History?
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been lost to time.
